version_description: Support for iOS 6 & iPhone 5

• Added display settings to customize text size, bold text, and flag size / row height
• Added a dark theme

If you enjoy using Currency, please take a moment to leave a review on the App Store.

• Support for Split View and Slide Over on iPad
• Support for 3D Touch on iPhone 6s
• Smart Quick Convert Values
• Spotlight Search for currencies

If you enjoy using Currency, please take a moment to leave a review on the App Store.

• Improved currency reorder and deletion
• Redesigned keypad screen
• Redesigned 3D Touch preview on iPhone 6s
• Redenomination of Belarusian ruble (BYR -> BYN)

If you enjoy using Currency, please take a moment to leave a review on the App Store.

• Added Ripple
• Added Cuban Convertible Peso
• Redenomination of São Tomé and Príncipe Dobra (STD -> STN)
• Redenomination of Mauritanian Ouguiya (MRO -> MRU)

• Updated for iPhone X and iOS 11
• Added Ethereum, Litecoin, and South Sudanese Pound
• Updated widget to match latest iOS style
• Base currency sticks to the top or bottom of the main list while scrolling
• Enhanced dark theme (switch themes by swiping up or down with two fingers anywhere in the app)
• Improved support for largest Dynamic Type font sizes
• Updated number display on keypad screen

• Added Ripple
• Added Cuban Convertible Peso
• Redenomination of São Tomé and Príncipe Dobra (STD -> STN)
• Redenomination of Mauritanian Ouguiya (MRO -> MRU)

Significant update to Apple Watch app:
• Completely re-written for latest watchOS
• Considerably faster app speed
• Works without being connected to iPhone
• Support for newest Apple Watch
• Add and delete currencies from app by using Force Touch

Other updates:
• Updated for latest iOS and newest iPhone devices
• Redenomination of Venezuelan Bolívar (VEF -> VES)

• Support for new iPad Pro
• Maximum number of decimal digits setting works again
• Fixed crash on iOS 9

• Support for new iPad Pro
• Maximum number of decimal digits setting works again
• Fixed crash on iOS 9

• Modernized app design (best on iOS 13)
• Updated app and widget for iOS 13
• Dark Mode on iOS 13, including system, light, and dark appearance settings
• Add or remove multiple currencies at once, instead of one at a time
• View quick conversion chart in a context menu (long press on a currency)
• Improved design for displaying amounts using inverse currency setting
• Added backspace button to keypad in watch app

• Modernized app design (best on iOS 13)
• Updated app and widget for iOS 13
• Dark Mode on iOS 13, including system, light, and dark appearance settings
• Add or remove multiple currencies at once, instead of one at a time
• View quick conversion chart in a context menu (long press on a currency)
• Improved design for displaying amounts using inverse currency setting
• Added backspace button to keypad in watch app

• Modernized app design (best on iOS 13)
• Updated app and widget for iOS 13
• Dark Mode on iOS 13, including system, light, and dark appearance settings
• Add or remove multiple currencies at once, instead of one at a time
• View quick conversion chart in a context menu (long press on a currency)
• Improved design for displaying amounts using inverse currency setting
• Added backspace button to keypad in watch app

Introducing Currency+:
• View historical charts to visualize exchange rates over time
• Receive near realtime exchange rates that update as often as every 5 minutes
• Remove advertisements
• Support app development
• People who have previously paid to remove ads receive access to all Currency+ features for free

Other updates:
• Added context menu action to copy conversion amount
• Improvements to consistency of currency names
• Improvements when displaying ads
• Optimized watch app design for latest Apple Watch models

Improved cursor support on iPadOS

Widgets for iOS 14:
• Beautifully designed widgets can be added to your Home Screen
• Displays up to three (small & medium widgets) or six (large widgets) currencies
• Set a custom list of currencies and/or amount separately from main app (requires Currency+)

Redesigned Apple Watch app:
• Improved design optimized for all Apple Watch models
• Add or remove currencies directly from the app
• Syncs automatically with your iPhone
• Set a custom list of currencies and/or amount separately from iPhone app (requires Currency+)

Other updates:
• Keypad screen features a beautiful new design using the flag colors
• Optimized for iOS 14 & iPadOS 14

• Brand new app icon
• Alternate app icons (including previous) available in settings
• Refined app design

• Alternate app icons (including previous) available in settings
